variable.name: F33VY
variable.comment: Visit year for which this form was collected.

variable.name: F33WHOM
variable.comment: Who is completing this form Not collected on all versions of Form 33.

variable.name: F33FAINT
variable.comment: Since your last medical update, have you fainted, blacked out, or lost consiousness? Not collected on versions of Form 33 used for the WHI Extension.

variable.name: F33FALLS
variable.comment: Since your last medical update, how many times did you fall and land on the floor or ground? Not collected on versions of Form 33 used for the WHI Extension.

variable.name: PHYSEXAM
variable.comment:
Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Physical exam or check up Not collected on all versions of Form 33.
Not collected on versions of Form 33 used for the WHI Extension.

variable.name: EYEEXAM
variable.comment:
Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Eye exam Not collected on all versions of Form 33.
Not collected on versions of Form 33 used for the WHI Extension.

variable.name: BRSTEXAM
variable.comment: Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Breast exam

variable.name: MAMMOGRM
variable.comment: Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Mammogram

variable.name: BRSTBPSY
variable.comment: Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Test of breast tissue or fluid for disease (Breast biopsy or aspiration)

variable.name: BRSTOTH
variable.description: F33 Other breast examintation tests such as MRI
variable.comment: Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Other breast examination tests such as MRI or ultrasound Not collected on versions of Form 33 used prior to the WHI Extension.

variable.name: RCTLEXAM
variable.comment: Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Rectal exam

variable.name: HEMOCLT
variable.comment: Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Test for the presence of blood in your stool or bowel movement (Hemoccult, guaiac)

variable.name: FLEXSIG
variable.comment: Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Tube inserted into your bowel from below to check for bowel problems (Sigmoidoscopy, flex. sig., or colonoscopy)

variable.name: BARIUM
variable.comment: Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Barium enema x-ray Not collected on all versions of Form 33.

variable.name: BPCHECK
variable.comment:
Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Blood pressure check Not collected on all versions of Form 33.
Not collected on versions of Form 33 used for the WHI Extension.

variable.name: CHOLCHK
variable.comment:
Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Blood cholesterol test Not collected on all versions of Form 33.
Not collected on versions of Form 33 used for the WHI Extension.

variable.name: ECG
variable.comment: Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Electrocardiogram (ECG) Not collected on versions of Form 33 used for the WHI Extension.

variable.name: PAPSMR
variable.comment: Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Pap smear Not collected on versions of Form 33 used for the WHI Extension.

variable.name: DANDC
variable.comment: Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Dilation and Curettage (D and C, womb scrape)

variable.name: ENDOBPSY
variable.comment: Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Endometrial biopsy

variable.name: HYSTEREC
variable.comment: Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Removal of the uterus or womb (Hysterectomy)

variable.name: BONEDENS
variable.comment: Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Bone density scan (e.g. DEXA) Not collected on versions of Form 33 used prior to the WHI Extension.
